title: GDG DevFest Pisa 0.1
description: The first Google tech conference in Pisa carefully crafted for you by the GDG Pisa! A 100% community based event, all about Android, Web & Cloud!
keywords: event, gdg, gde, devfest, google, programming, android, chrome, polymer, developers, web, cloud, androiddev
motto: An entire day of tech talks, workshops, networking and community!
ticketsDetails: Tickets grant access to all conference sections and coffee breaks.
socialMotto: Tweet, like, follow or connect with us on
clickToViewPhotos: Click here to view more photos
locationDescription: Directly in the center of Pisa, just a few meter next to the University Computer Science department
aboutOrganizers: DevFest Pisa 0.1 is organized by GDG Pisa with support of the whole community.
aboutGdg: A Google Developers Group (GDG) - is an open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion
teamPageText:
Google is known all around the world. Everyone is 'googling', checking on 'maps' and communicating in 'gmail'. For simple users, they are services that just works, but not for us. Developers see much more: APIs, scalability issues, complex technology stacks. And that is what GDG is about.

[Google Developers Group (GDG) Pisa](http://gdgpisa.it/) - is open and volunteer geek community who create exciting projects and share experience about Google technologies with a passion.

Our goal is to organize space to connect the best industry experts with Italian audience to boost development of IT.
